parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the forecast fog value. A value of 0 means no fog, 1 means maximum fog.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''fogForecast'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_level = [[fogForecast]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> This command returns the local forcast fog value. Each client and the server can have differing values.
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[fogParams]], [[fog]], [[setFog]], [[nextWeatherChange]]
</value></part></template>
